  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">És veritat que els humans venim dels micos?</string>
            <string language="en">Is it true humans come from monkeys?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist es zutreffende Menschen kommt von den 
Fallhammern?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Est-ce les humains vrais viennent-il des singes ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É seres humanos verdadeiros vem dos macacos?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È esseri umani allineare viene dalle scimmie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι αληθινοί άνθρωποι προέρχεται από τους 
πιθήκους;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que explica que els humans no provenen de micos com el goril·la, el ximpanzé o l'orangutan, sinó d'altres primats que no viuen en l'actualitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) explaining humans don't come from monkeys such as gorillas, chimpanzees or orang-utans, but from other primates that no longer exist.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">evolució (biologia)</string>
            <string language="en">evolution (biology)</string>
            <string language="es">evolución (biología)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">home</string>
            <string language="en">man</string>
            <string language="es">hombre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Frage und Antwort (DURCHSCHNITTLICH) Menschen 
erklärend kommen nicht von den Fallhammern wie Gorillas, Schimpansen 
oder orang-utans, aber von anderen Primas, die nicht mehr existieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La question et la réponse (PAR) expliquant des humains ne
viennent pas des singes tels que des gorilles, chimpanzés ou 
orang-utans, mais d'autres primats qui n'existent plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pergunta e a resposta (PAR) que explica seres humanos 
não vêm dos macacos tais como gorillas, chimpanzés ou orang-utans, 
mas de outros primatas que existem não mais por muito tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La domanda e la risposta (PAR) che spiega gli esseri umani
non vengono dalle scimmie quali i gorillas, scimpanzè o orang-utans, 
ma da altri primati che più non esistono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που εξηγούν στους 
ανθρώπους δεν προέρχονται από τους πιθήκους όπως οι γορίλλες, 
χιμπατζές ή orang-utans, αλλά από άλλους αρχιεπισκόπους που 
δεν υπάρχουν πλέον.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung (Biologie)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mann</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évolution (biologie)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">homme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">evolução (biologia)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">homem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo (biologia)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">uomo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξέλιξη (η βιολογία)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άτομο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
